description: Share of people affected by income poverty in the permanent resident population living in private households
remark: excluding the imputed rent 2014: break in the time series due to methodological adaptations A confidence interval informs about the precision of results of sample surveys. The interval contains the true value with a probability of 95%. Last update:  21.11.2024 Source: FSO – Statistics on Income and Living Conditions (SILC) © FSO 2024
